Unequal answered the call with its EXOskeleton â¢ technology that it originally developed for the military. Michael Vick used the Unequal Chest Protector in the November 7th game against the Indianapolis Colts to protect his ribs. After the game Michael Vick said the Unequal Pad made him feel invincible. by the data from the three newer large rail metropolitan areas( see the section "Rail and Traffic Congestion" above). Congestion Cost Savings. The conclusion of "Washington's War" was that work-trip travel times are longer and traffic congestion is more intense in the large-rail metropolitan areas than in the 43 metropolitan areas without intense rail systems. The costs of lost time( including longer travel times due to congestion and the excess time of transit travel) are thus higher in large-rail metropolitan areas. Further, these longer travel times retard economic and employment growth and result in higher rates of unemployment for lower-income households.( Emphasis added.)
